scripts.codegen: rm -rf src/generated-sources/openapi; openapi-generator-cli generate -i ../game/src/main/resources/api.yml -o src/generated-sources/openapi/game -g typescript-axios --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,npmVersion=6.9.0,typescriptThreePlus=true; openapi-generator-cli generate -i ../user/user-service/src/main/resources/api.yml -o src/generated-sources/openapi/user -g typescript-axios --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,npmVersion=6.9.0,typescriptThreePlus=true; openapi-generator-cli generate -i ../auth/auth-service/src/main/resources/api.yml -o src/generated-sources/openapi/auth -g typescript-axios --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,npmVersion=6.9.0,typescriptThreePlus=true
scripts.codegen-win: if exist src\generated-sources\openapi rmdir /s /q src\generated-sources\openapi && openapi-generator-cli generate -i ..\game\src\main\resources\api.yml -o src\generated-sources\openapi\game -g typescript-axios --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,npmVersion=6.9.0,typescriptThreePlus=true && openapi-generator-cli generate -i ..\user\user-service\src\main\resources\api.yml -o src\generated-sources\openapi\user -g typescript-axios --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,npmVersion=6.9.0,typescriptThreePlus=true && openapi-generator-cli generate -i ..\auth\auth-service\src\main\resources\api.yml -o src\generated-sources\openapi\auth -g typescript-axios --additional-properties=supportsES6=true,npmVersion=6.9.0,typescriptThreePlus=true
